Align Self

# Align Self

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                 | Support        |
| --------------------- | -------------- |
| ```
self-auto
```     | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
self-start
```    | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
self-end
```      | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
self-center
```   | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
self-stretch
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
self-baseline
``` | ✅ Full Support |
